Somehow still the best singleplayer FPS game. 9/10
I mean it's half-life 2 what can you say its an amazing game with an amazing story.

We can be witnessed the evolution of the game sector well in this game. I can't still comprehend how this game can still be good even after 16 years. The game can still rival today's games. The game takes in a big area, so we are on a big adventure from buildings to rural. The graphics are still good. The atmosphere is perfect, the topic is reflected by the atmosphere well. The topic processed is fluent. There is no game music that we can remember. If there was a song in good places. we would be affected perfectly. The gameplay is good as always, but when we fight the enemies, companions may block us during the clash, so this may damage the fluency of the game sometimes. Although ı played the game first time in 2020, ı am satisfied.
Это одна из самых - самых лучших вселенных видеоигр
Still an amazing game 16 years later.  In the words of Dr. Freeman: "".

Why haven't you played this yet? If you need to play the first half-life still, go pick up Black Mesa, its worth every penny. Then get this and slap some texture and model mods on it to shine it up if you like!
Yo no se que es este juego nunca lo jugue nunca lo fanee es una mierda

Half-Life 2 absolutely deserves its reputation as a monumental first-person shooter title. Somehow, it still holds up over fifteen years later – sure, the graphics are starting to show age, but the degradation is nowhere near severe enough to stop someone with any willingness to look past that. The mechanics and the story are still as intuitive, exciting, and...well, fun...as they were those many years ago.

Even as someone who doesn't have any great nostalgia for Half-Life (original titles slightly before my time), it's instantly obvious how the world and gameplay enraptured so many people. If you've never played through Half-Life 2 (or any other titles in the series), I highly recommend it – not just as a great title, but as an integral piece of gaming history.

To all that reads this comment/review please continue to read. 

This my story and my journey from the glorious City-17 Where you start your journey to the lab/science location Black Mesa East To the amazing town called Ravenholm, Where you end up on the Highway 17 where you end up ending in Nova Prospekt, Where you fight from Headcrabs that are poisonous and toxic and very lethal to big machines, It's an amazing journey from the beginning to the end. This is a truly masterpiece. A game before it's time. I hope truly one day to see the end of the journey of G-Man,

Наиграв в эту игру около 300 часов я понял одну важную вещь, что не во всех играх решает графика или динамика. А сюжет, проработанный персонаж которым охото верить и сочучтвовать всеми ими бедами. Когда ты в первые заходишь в Half-Life 2 ты понимаешь что эта игра затянет тебя не на одну бессонную ночь. Чем она цепляет я уже написал, но из минусов могу определить только 2 вещи. 1.Это понятная всем вещь ГРАФИКА но все те возгласы не честных по типу "Там графика картонная, иди лучше поиграй в КСГО" можно списать на возраст данной игрушки а именно 16 Карл лет, конечно она будет подустаревшая. 2. Минус это наследие этой игры а именно КСГО как по мне эта игра убило устоявшоесе на 2013 год понятие ОНЛАЙН ШУТЕР ОТ ПЕРВОГО ЛИЦА и понятно что в худшую сторону, как по мне Half-Life 2 недостойна такого наследника. 10 Гордонов из 10
